comment.body: 赞，这样博客就可以互动评论啦^_^

好消息，这样就可以很方便地创建处于自己的博客了^_^
我的博客地址：http://127.0.0.1:43110/12ygu8wKLgAyK5u7fScYDsubRXHAHUoFQL

> [p2p](#comment_7_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): do u remember http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:2@62/Start+a+new+site+using+Tor+can+you+see+my+sitei've succeeded in publishing a new site using Tor. it said"Site:16ynw3..PJ3K Publishing to 20/8 peers...Site:16ynw3..PJ3K [FAILED] 95...:15441: NoneSite:16ynw3..PJ3K [FAILED] 77...:15441: None..."but this time using web UI, it said "Publishing to 0/0 peers..." and even no [FAILED] message. so i think it is a bug. did u forget to remove a limit in ZeroBlog's source code? remember the "Port not opened, passive publishing not support yet" limit?BTW, my new clone site is http://127.0.0.1:43110/12uk9Nz7UxaKvhCgEQ6drECXaHzBVzWhhu/if u access the site and u have a open port, u will be a node which i can publish to using Tor. THX!
> Edit:
> Site:12uk9N..Whhu Publishing to 1/1 peers...Site:12uk9N..Whhu Successfuly published to 1 peers,WOW! succeed! thanks to the node.its NOT a bug. we should tell someone else (who have a open port ) our site address before we publish using Tor.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/12uk9Nz7UxaKvhCgEQ6drECXaHzBVzWhhu/
NO PEERS FOUND
如果有人将每次的ZeroNet的博客翻译成中文就好了，希望有志愿者出现^_^

> [p2p](#comment_9_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): where is GeoLite2 City database hosted? download is slow, and seems failed.

你现在安装测试成功了吗？
